title: Implement full project delete flow
description: godeploy delete <project> with confirmation. DELETE /api/projects/:projectId with cascade delete. Dashboard delete with confirmation modal.

title: Implement godeploy validate command
description: Validate config file exists and is valid JSON, check source_dir exists and contains files, verify index.html exists. Catches deployment errors before they happen.

title: Add config file discovery with upward directory traversal
description: Search parent directories for godeploy.config.json (like git does for .git). Deploy from any subdirectory, common in monorepos.

title: Hide unimplemented stub commands from CLI help
description: Add Hidden: true to stub commands in Kong parser, or move to godeploy labs subcommand. Cleaner help output, reduces user confusion.

title: Use Huh for interactive godeploy auth login/signup
description: Replace basic email/password prompts with charmbracelet/huh forms. Add input validation, password confirmation for signup, themed styling.

title: Use Bubbles list for project listing
description: Display projects using charmbracelet/bubbles list component. Add fuzzy filtering, pagination, status indicators, interactive selection.

title: Add drag-and-drop deployment from dashboard
description: Allow drag-and-drop or file upload deployment from dashboard. Lower barrier to entry, useful for quick tests. API already supports multipart upload.

title: Add upload progress indicator to deploy command
description: Show progress bar with percentage, transfer speed, and ETA during upload. Large uploads no longer feel like CLI has hung.

title: Interactive godeploy init with auto-detection of build directories
description: Auto-detect common build output directories (dist, build, out, .next/out, public) and prompt user interactively for app name. Reduces time to first deploy.

title: Implement rollback functionality
description: Store deployment manifests to track files per deploy. godeploy rollback <project> reverts to previous successful deploy. Production safety net.

title: Add --json output flag for CI/CD integration
description: Structured JSON output for all commands when --json flag passed. Machine-readable output for CI/CD pipelines and scripting.

title: Implement godeploy open command
description: Open project URL in default browser. Client-side only, no API needed. Instant gratification after deploy.

title: Use Huh for interactive godeploy init form
description: Replace basic prompts with charmbracelet/huh form for init command. Prompt for app name, auto-detect source_dir with select, add description field.

title: Implement --dry-run flag for deploy command
description: Create archive but don't upload. Show what would be deployed (file list, sizes). CI/CD safety, confidence before deploying to production.

title: Implement deployment history CLI and API
description: godeploy deployments <project> - list recent deploys with status, time, commit info. GET /api/projects/:projectId/deployments endpoint. Data exists in DB.

title: Add Log library for structured CLI logging
description: Use charmbracelet/log for verbose/debug mode output. Styled, leveled logging that integrates with existing lipgloss theme.

title: Use Bubbles progress bar for deploy uploads
description: Replace spinner with charmbracelet/bubbles progress bar during file upload. Show percentage, transfer speed, animated fill with Harmonica.

title: Implement godeploy whoami command
description: Show current authenticated user, email, tenant, subscription status. Debug auth issues, confirm correct account before deploying.

title: Add Glamour markdown rendering for help output
description: Use charmbracelet/glamour to render rich markdown help text. Improve --help output with styled headers, code blocks, links.

title: Use Huh spinner for deploy processing
description: Use charmbracelet/huh/spinner for deploy post-upload processing phase. Show action title (Uploading files, Processing deployment, etc).

title: Use Huh confirm for destructive actions
description: Use charmbracelet/huh Confirm field for delete, rollback, and other destructive operations. Styled Yes/No prompts with clear warnings.

title: Improve deploy error messages with actionable guidance
description: Return specific error codes and actionable messages. Include file paths when relevant. Suggest fixes (e.g., did you run your build command first?).

title: Create consistent CLI theme using Lipgloss
description: Define consistent color scheme and styling across all CLI output using lipgloss. Create reusable style components for success/error/info messages.

title: Use Bubbles table for deployment history display
description: Display deployment history using charmbracelet/bubbles table component. Show status, project, time, commit info in navigable table.
